@export.@description: Host layers on AWS using Lambda, API Gateway, Route 53 and ACM

deploy.@description: Deploy your layer to AWS Lambda

executionRole.@description: The name of the IAM role that Lambda assumes when it serves your layer

memorySize.@description: The maximum amount of memory, in MB, allocated to your layer

timeout.@description: The maximum execution time, in seconds, of the layer methods

reservedConcurrentExecutions.@description: The number of concurrent executions reserved for this function

endpointType.@description: Type of the API Gateway endpoint (either 'regional' or 'edge')

region.@description: The AWS region in which your layer must be hosted
